testsuite.name: Scenario: Ensure the Search filters work using the Questions column

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search filters work using the Questions column

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search filters work using the Questions column

testcase.name: When I click "All Content Types" in the "Current Class" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search filters work using the Questions column

testcase.name: Then I click the Search button in the "All Content Types" column and verify the Search filters are visible inside column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search filters work using the Questions column

testcase.name: When I set the "Type" dropdown to "True/False" in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search filters work using the Questions column

testcase.name: Then verify that "[Demo] True/False" is visible in the Search results in the "All Content Types" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure the Search filters work using the Questions column
